channel.title: Hyperion client?
channel.description: the client that comes with hyperion is it just the orignal de-obed client? and if i got the orignal refracted 317 well it do the same? sorry for asking a dumb question but i want to add stuff to its client, i like the hyperion server. i thank graham and all that helped him on it for it. thx.
